parameters.name: DBType
parameters.description: The type of the database engine. Only **MySQL** is supported.

parameters.name: DBVersion
parameters.description:
The version of the database. Valid values:

*   **5.6**
*   **5.7**
*   **8.0**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~98041~~) operation to query all regions that are available within your account, such as the region IDs.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
